name: Get Caught by Monk
description:
Celebrating Vesak day at the biggest Buddhist Temple in the world is something that every Buddhist dreams of. Pilgrims from all around the world are commencing a series of rituals and ceremonies.

The whole event was amazing and tons of people plunged into the rituals and ceremonial, unexpectedly some of the tourists were whispering behind the people who were praying and one of them saw our noise
at that time. Personally, I want to apologise for the inconvenience. However, this picture become one of the most iconic photos on my files.
